snippet: Brown University announced on Tuesday that it would increase its voluntary payments to the City of Providence, where officials are trying to shore up finances to avoid bankruptcy.
abstract: Brown University announces it will increase its voluntary payments to the City of Providence, RI, where officials are trying to shore up finances to avoid bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: Brown University announced on Tuesday that it would increase its voluntary payments to the City of Providence, where officials are trying to shore up finances to avoid bankruptcy.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Brown to Increase Pay to Providence
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Brown To Increase Pay To Providence
